body:
Hello everyone! We are having some issues with /report at the moment. We cannot read the player names. Here is an example:http://gyazo.com/ddd6c33ba8cdff5805a915006ec66a85
Please hang in there while we attempt to fix this problem. Thanks for your time!

title: Recent Issues With /report

replies.body:
Peachy, I already made a topic like 10 minutes ago and said about it on staff chat.
But this is just more proof.

replies.body: This is alerting the public so they don't go frantic when no reports are answered, Alex.

replies.body: Ok then, but yeah no point in reports untill its fixed...
